comments: Play this game if you have all kinds of money and just want to pay to win. There is little fun to be had outside of that.  Update: the developers listened to feedback and have been adding numerous ways to get advantages for free. Here is some respect for listening to your users. Rating increased!

I overall enjoy the game.  I did the tavern and did a volley for rewards. It showed I won one thing and it gave me another. I took a screen shot of it, sent it to customer service to be compensated.  They say, sorry it was a display error you got the correct rewards. Ummm, no I didn't! It showed I won a valor stone and they gave me a champion stone.  I even had the screen shots to prove it!!  Very unhappy with it and the customer service.  It's not my fault the game glitched, and I should be compensated with what it showed I won. It is NOT my fault the game had a display error.  I have spent money on this game ( more than I will admit) but after the way this was handled,  I will not spend another dime.  Although they probably don't care, as they have shown me already, it is just very disappointing. The way they treat the folks that put the money in their pockets....

I maintain my stance that this game is pay to win. Peaceful, nonpaying lords are punished harshly by higher level lords that just teleport next to you and raid your city until you have nothing left. This problem has been made even worse with the killing event. It lasts 4 whole days and invites so much violence and destruction that small peaceful cities are completely set back to square one by larger more powerful lords. I appreciated the hours I spent into this game, but I cannot support what the developers are doing at this time.
Great game. New problem with update. I can't enter the magic spire. Every time I try, game crashes.

This is the most addictive game I ever played.  Super cool and really fun to play every moment is worth the play. Plus you get to meet so many people all over the world. You become great friends or earth rivals. Thank you for an awesome game and for the interaction with the developers.
Can get expensive... and be sure to keep track of purchases because on numerous occasions i have been double sometimes tripple billed.

description: Are you a genius? Are you ready to take the Solve This In 30s challenge? This is the hardest raft challenge you can possibly play right now . This meme quiz game is really easy to play, just try to figure out where is the given word or symbol..  and try not to laugh if you lose ! It looks easy right? Well you will judge yourself after playing this trivia. You will see ! LWIAY and start challenging your reigns friends !We have pick the best conundrums for this app, check those and try to getting over it ! This is the trap adventure game, once you have played with the first conundrum a timeleft will appear, then you need to solve the quiz in 30 secondsOnce you have found the word or symbol then you will be go to the next level, how far are you able to go? Show now your friends how genius you are ! . But can you do this?The topic of the conundrums are general .. from words , symbols like tide pods or uganda knuckles..  you can see the variety is huge !Solve This in 30 seconds was popularised by youtubers life pewdiepie and markiplier. I have been playing for a while now, I like almost all of the game, not too impressed that "the piggy bank " is basically held to ransom until you buy it... find another way to entice spending... reduce number of coins won or something but as the levels get hard if you dont spend money you get stuck even with team helps.. it gets disheartening and reduces interest after a while.. to the gamemakers: keep the game playable..the money will come

Update...as I go though the levels Ill get stuck for a day or two...even 3 on a level. Gameplay FUN has Dropped significantly. Moved to 3 stars as a result. If it does not change I'll continue to move to 1 star. Games are many to be played...not just stuck on a level forever!  Other issue with the game is that there's so much clicking and waiting once you win. I wish that it would just go right to the next level and it wouldn't have to wait for the splash screen. I just spend so much time wasted versus playing

description: WELCOME TO THE FUNNIEST CARTOON PUZZLE ADVENTURE!From the creators of Toy Blast comes the ultimate puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun!Enter the crazy cartoon world starring Cooper Cat, Wally Wolf, Bruno Bear and enjoy loads of whacky and challenging levels! Join the wildest adventure of your life and have a BLAST!FEATURES:‚óè Complete tons of challenging levels and unlock new episodes!‚óè Play with unique game objectives and dozens of entertaining obstacles!‚óè Unlock whacky boosters to blast your way to the next level!‚óè Collect stars by completing levels to win awesome rewards!‚óè Create your own team & compete with others to rule the puzzle world! ‚óè Receive lives from your teammates to keep on playing! ‚óè Sync your game easily between your phone and tablet!‚óè Easy and fun to play yet challenging to master!
descriptionHTML:
WELCOME TO THE FUNNIEST CARTOON PUZZLE ADVENTURE!

From the creators of Toy Blast comes the ultimate puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun!

Enter the crazy cartoon world starring Cooper Cat, Wally Wolf, Bruno Bear and enjoy loads of whacky and challenging levels! Blast cubes and create powerful combos to pass levels. Solve puzzles to help the Toon gang as they travel around magical worlds!

Join the wildest adventure of your life and have a BLAST!

FEATURES:

● Complete tons of challenging levels and unlock new episodes!
● Play with unique game objectives and dozens of entertaining obstacles!
● Unlock whacky boosters to blast your way to the next level!
● Collect stars by completing levels to win awesome rewards!
● Create your own team & compete with others to rule the puzzle world!
● Receive lives from your teammates to keep on playing!
● Sync your game easily between your phone and tablet!
● Easy and fun to play yet challenging to master!
recentChanges: It's time for an inexplicable new update!

- PLAY 50 NEW LEVELS! Mysterious circles on the crop fields, strange lights flashing in the night skies... Things will get bizarre at the rural farms as UFOs visit secluded places of the countryside! Play the new levels and see if farmers can save themselves from this enigmatic abductors from the outer space?
Be sure to update to the current version of Toon Blast for the newest content. In every 2 weeks, we bring 50 NEW LEVELS! Come and join the fun!
summary: WELCOME TO THE FUNNIEST CARTOON PUZZLE ADVENTURE!
title: Toon Blast

descriptionHTML:
Help the rolling ball escape the traps and unlock featured themes.
An addictive thrilling game “Scrolling Ball in Sky” landing on Google Play market now. The future door opens for you from the moment you tap on the screen.
The game features:
● Unique gameplay: help the balls rolling farther and farther away by swiping left or right.
● 3D scene design combined with rock music brings you addictive pleasure.
● Exciting levels: volcano scapes, city scape, desert scape, garden scape and rolling sky scape etc.!
● Fantastic balls: discover all the secrets it holds by rolling balls, or equips in rainbow shop.
● Invite your Facebook friends to challenge your unbeaten record!
Be attention to the roll ball story, you may get a chance to play spin wheel to obtain an unexpected surprise. Do not indulge in the game or you may costs 24 hours in rolling the balls. Very easy to play but very hard to reach the top records!
Scrolling Ball in Sky is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this option, simply turn it off in your device's Restrictions menu.
developerAddress: 126 Wood Duck Drive Watersmeet MI US
summary: Help the rolling ball escape the traps and unlock featured themes.

descriptionHTML:
Experience the speed and intensity of Ice Hockey with the return of the HOCKEY NATIONS franchise! Deliver those big hits, wind up a howitzer of a slap-shot and aim a well-timed wrister while playing in 7 thrilling tournaments in HOCKEY NATIONS 18.

HEATED RIVALRY
Some of the greatest hockey rivalries battle it out in the RIVALS SERIES. Take control of the game and earn those bragging rights with 50 intense challenges!

DREAM OF GOLD
What better way to enter the world of International Hockey than skating out for your team in the Winter Games! Go stick to stick with some of the greatest teams and come away with the gold medal!

3 ON 3 SUPER SERIES
Six club teams from USA, CANADA and RUSSIA will battle it out to be crowned the 3 ON 3 SUPER SERIES Champions. Which team will you guide to the finals?

LIVE GAMES
Join others and compete in regular LIVE GAMES. Earn points for your team and lead them to victory. Prove you're the one of the best as you climb to the top of the influencers leaderboard.

FACE-OFF
Choose from 40 North American Teams, 27 Russian League Teams, 19 International Teams or 2 All-Star teams and go head-to-head in a one-off battle on the ice.

PLAYOFFS
North America or Russian Playoffs, the choice is yours. Choose your team and lead them all the way to the Playoff Final. Will you take home the trophy?

OUTDOOR SERIES
See the game in a whole new light! Under the cold blue skies of ponds and stadiums, six teams will battle it out to be crowned the OUTDOOR SERIES CHAMPIONS!

Important
This game is free-to-play but does include optional in-app purchases to access some of the game modes, which can be purchased with real money.

Over 80 teams at club and international level.
7 exciting tournaments.
Motion captured animations.
Live Games.
Intuitive controls.

description: Best ancient history adventure! Travel in time to the age of pharaohs, when monument building and pyramid exploration were normal! Enjoy creative crafting & building of a desert city, visit the Sphynx, explore the mummy tombs! The whole ancient world waits to be explored!Get right into the exploration of an ancient city of the pyramids! Have a walk in the desert, watch a beautiful sunset! Visit the sphynx statue, go on an adventure around the pyramids, see the best parts of Egypt! Stroll on the banks of the great river Nile.Become a pharaoh and rule your desert kingdom! Walk among your subjects like a god, destroy buildings as you please, build any kind of monuments you want! This is your world and pyramid building is only one of the possible ways of spending your time. Use the creative mode to unleash the power of your imagination to better the world (or to crush it!). Create, destroy, enjoy!Best free crafting game of 2018! Use blueprints to build ancient monuments that will inspire awe. Simply place one and start filling it with blocks to recreate the most famous ancient egyptian structures that you'll certainly remember from history books. This free building game will also let you use your own imagination to create anything you want. Would you like to see a medieval castle in the middle of the desert? Go for it! Do you want to build your own house? Let's do it! Mine and craft materials from sands and stones.Crafting & building a city will allow you to feel like you've actually traveled in time to the age of ancient Egypt. The hot deserts, sandy buildings and people dressed in robes are all presented using unique blocky graphics that may remind you of other adventure games with building and exploration. All of this is your sandbox where you are free to do as you please. Crafting & building will become your second nature.Look no further - one of the top ancient history city building games is here! Download now and become a pharaoh!
descriptionHTML:
Best ancient history adventure! Travel in time to the age of pharaohs, when monument building and pyramid exploration were normal! Enjoy creative crafting & building of a desert city, visit the Sphynx, explore the mummy tombs! The whole ancient world waits to be explored!

Get right into the exploration of an ancient city of the pyramids! Have a walk in the desert, watch a beautiful sunset! Visit the sphynx statue, go on an adventure around the pyramids, see the best parts of Egypt! Stroll on the banks of the great river Nile.

Become a pharaoh and rule your desert kingdom! Walk among your subjects like a god, destroy buildings as you please, build any kind of monuments you want! This is your world and pyramid building is only one of the possible ways of spending your time. Use the creative mode to unleash the power of your imagination to better the world (or to crush it!). This free building game will also let you use your own imagination to create anything you want. Would you like to see a medieval castle in the middle of the desert? Go for it! Crafting & building a city will allow you to feel like you've actually traveled in time to the age of ancient Egypt. The hot deserts, sandy buildings and people dressed in robes are all presented using unique blocky graphics that may remind you of other adventure games with building and exploration. All of this is your sandbox where you are free to do as you please. Crafting & building will become your second nature.

Look no further - one of the top ancient history city building games is here! Download now and become a pharaoh!

description: You will really feel like you are behind the wheel of a muscle car. Cruise around the city in your car with friends, and experience how cool and difficult it can be at the same time. Explore the city, and perhaps you will find something interesting. You have a 360-degree view of the cabin. Fun companions are waiting for you to join them in the game.Set up a race according to your own rules! Turn on the music and let's go!!!!           Tips:1. Do not speed. Drive carefully in order to avoid crashing or damaging your muscle car. 2. Beware of the traffic police. If you speed, then you will get a ticket. 3. Pay attention to the interactive hints.  4. Don't forget to fill up your car with gas at the gas station.5. It is cheaper to pay a bribe than the official ticket.  6. For your convenience, please keep the doors locked when driving.    Please note: The input area for the interactive buttons is around the center of the screen.    ***Game features:***- Fun interactive game with endless replay value.- Daily bonuses. - First-person mode. - Richly detailed car models.- Many of the components inside the car are interactive.- You can modify and tune your car in a large number of ways. - Interesting map of the city and its environs.- Interactive gas station.  - Fun arcade-style missions.- Service station cars: Car Service: Tinted, Low Ride, Paint, License Plate, Body Repair, Wheel Rims... - Car showroom.- Additional multiplayer-mode missions.    Additional bonus! The game contains an additional 3 cars. One of the cars has a dead battery, the second lacks one entirely, and the third is missing a wheel. Find a way to get them going again, and they will be yours!!! Hint! New modern 3 muscle cars.  Bonus!Baseball-bat. Play the beta versions. Follow us!Tell us your wishes for new features and comments about the game.  Download and play OPPANA GAMES! And enjoy yourself!  https://www.facebook.com/OppanaGameshttps://vk.com/oppana_games   While you're thinking, your friend is already driving!
descriptionHTML:
You will really feel like you are behind the wheel of a muscle car. Cruise around the city in your car with friends, and experience how cool and difficult it can be at the same time.
Explore the city, and perhaps you will find something interesting.
You have a 360-degree view of the cabin. Fun companions are waiting for you to join them in the game.
Set up a race according to your own rules! Turn on the music and let's go!!!!


Tips:
1. Do not speed. Drive carefully in order to avoid crashing or damaging your muscle car.
2. Beware of the traffic police. If you speed, then you will get a ticket.
3. Pay attention to the interactive hints.
4. Don't forget to fill up your car with gas at the gas station.
5. It is cheaper to pay a bribe than the official ticket.
6. For your convenience, please keep the doors locked when driving.

Please note: The input area for the interactive buttons is around the center of the screen.

***Game features:***
- Fun interactive game with endless replay value.
- Daily bonuses.
- First-person mode.
- Richly detailed car models.
- Many of the components inside the car are interactive.
- You can modify and tune your car in a large number of ways.
- Interesting map of the city and its environs.
- Interactive gas station.
- Fun arcade-style missions.
- Service station cars: Car Service: Tinted, Low Ride, Paint, License Plate, Body Repair, Wheel Rims...
- Car showroom.
- Additional multiplayer-mode missions.

Additional bonus!
The game contains an additional 3 cars. One of the cars has a dead battery, the second lacks one entirely,
and the third is missing a wheel. Find a way to get them going again, and they will be yours!!!

Hint!
New modern 3 muscle cars.

Bonus!
Baseball-bat.

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to viking village! Let’s explore racing tracks and prepare for the racing championship. Become a part of viking legend and leave your footprint in the racing history!

FUNNY CARS

Choose one of the unique viking cars - be sure to try all of them and find your favorite. Play enough to unlock all cars - you will get new hidden car from time to time. All racing cars are well crafted and ready for unpredictable race! They are armored with viking horns and viking shields in case of a golem attack.

MISSION

Viking village is the regular place for golem and viking wars. You have to avoid furious golem and viking warriors. They will try to overtake and prevent you from the victory. Watch out for explosive obstacles and falling stones. Drive carefully on wrecked road, jump over the road gaps and overcome muddy road sections.

You are the last hope of peaceful vikings. Become a real viking warrior and win this racing championship to finish golem and viking raids.

Be aware of viking ships while racing. Mysterious longships can chase you!

WHAT TO EXPECT:

◆ Intense viking race
◆ Funny cars
◆ Interesting gameplay
◆ Simple controls
◆ Full of action viking game
◆ Viking vs golem fights

CONTROLS

Drive funny cars and enjoy this awesome viking game. There are two worlds: Viking village and Golemberg. Each world contains 12 levels. Challenge yourself and finish them as fast as you can!

◆ Ready, set, GO with the start button and enjoy fun viking race.
◆ Use ARROW buttons to make cool stunts, front and back flips.
◆ Come back to play the game everyday and collect as much coins as you can. Use them to claim new cars and unlock new world.

Invite your friends and family members to play viking game together. This viking race game is free to play for everyone.

EDUCATIONAL VALUE

Viking race game is good for learning to STIMULATE your reaction, DEVELOP hand-eye coordination, self-preservation and self-control. Enjoy fun car racing and IMPROVE problem solving, quick decision making and flexible thinking skills.

MINI GAMES

Need a short break from vikings? Get some rest and play these funny mini games: Balloon Pop, Puzzles, Memory Game, Coloring book and Match Shapes.

NOTICE

This game of vikings is completely free to play, but it also offers in-app purchases.

◆◆◆ ABOUT TINY LAB GAMES ◆◆◆

Tiny Lab Games is a publisher and developer of innovative, high-quality and free-to-play mobile games designed for families. Company is famous for its leading games series Fun Kid Racing. Search Tiny Lab Games on the app store and discover even more fun games!

Learn more about Tiny Lab Games and contact us at the following:

WEBSITE: http://www.tinylabkids.com
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/TinyLabKids
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/TinyLabKids
YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/TinyLabKids
POPJAM: TinyLabKids
EMAIL: support@tinylabproductions.com

comments: A good app which helps you understand the location and names of countries. Hoewever there are a few mistakes. Also very small countries like Monaco, Vatican city and a few others are not included. Please include them in the future versions

When highlighting Australia, I have options for various African countries. Very, very simple game that would be great for children. Rather boring an repetitive with some graphics issues to iron out (like highlight Lesotho and South Africa together)

Only using the basic game, but there are several errors in the select(?) process for game 2 because i get maps and no valid option from the select list. Also cant get game 1 to move passed 1/6. Otherwise, a brilliant game

It's worth the $2.99 I really wanted to master my world geography. I love it. I does cover the entire world with the $2.99 purchase. I'm up to Level 37. I can't seem to get past level 37 though so it may be the last level, but you can still repeat levels to master the world.
Showed me a country and a list of choices but the correct answer was not listed...got it wrong of course. Quiz is very repetitive.

(ATTENTION DEVELOPERS) It would be great, except on the intermediate level of "name the country", frequently it highlights a  country which is NOT on the list you're supposed to pick from. So whatever you choose as an answer, will be guaranteed uncorrect.
description: Treefort's Geography Brain Trainer is ideal for students of any age looking to learn and master country names and locations. Become a geography pro in your spare time!Brain TrainingWith an interactive 3d globe, challenging quizzes, and a trophy reward system, the Geography Brain Trainer is a fun yet addictive way to train your brain and build up your geographical knowledge of the world's countries. Working through each difficulty of the Geography Brain Trainer will help you to both easily name a country and pinpoint any country on the globe!The Geography Brain Trainer has two learning challenges:(1)	Name the CountryName the Country will quiz you with different country locations and challenge you to select the correct country. (2)	Find the CountryFind the Country will test your ability to pinpoint a country on the Geography Brain Trainer's interactive globe.TrophiesTrophies are given for each level difficulty in the Geography Brain Trainer: beginner, intermediate, and advanced. To earn a trophy you will first need to work through the world's continents and geographic regions:- Europe- Asia- North and South America- Africa- Oceania Along with a global 'all' challenge to test your mental ability to move between regions. The Geography Brain Trainer is free and can be used offline, with a single one-time purchase to unlock the 'advanced' difficulty setting.Master the Geography Brain Trainer and master the globe!
descriptionHTML:
Treefort's Geography Brain Trainer is ideal for students of any age looking to learn and master country names and locations. Become a geography pro in your spare time!

Brain Training

With an interactive 3d globe, challenging quizzes, and a trophy reward system, the Geography Brain Trainer is a fun yet addictive way to train your brain and build up your geographical knowledge of the world's countries. Working through each difficulty of the Geography Brain Trainer will help you to both easily name a country and pinpoint any country on the globe!

The Geography Brain Trainer has two learning challenges:

(1) Name the Country

Name the Country will quiz you with different country locations and challenge you to select the correct country.

(2) Find the Country

Find the Country will test your ability to pinpoint a country on the Geography Brain Trainer's interactive globe.

Trophies

Trophies are given for each level difficulty in the Geography Brain Trainer: beginner, intermediate, and advanced. To earn a trophy you will first need to work through the world's continents and geographic regions:

- Europe
- Asia
- North and South America
- Africa
- Oceania

Along with a global 'all' challenge to test your mental ability to move between regions. The Geography Brain Trainer is free and can be used offline, with a single one-time purchase to unlock the 'advanced' difficulty setting.

Master the Geography Brain Trainer and master the globe!

title: Geography Brain Trainer

description: Border Security Wall Construction is a fascinating edition created by TwoTwenty games. In this special defense strategy games you are going to enjoy the mixture of the building and defending at the same time. This wall construction games will allow you to play the role of the builder and army force at the same time. It will give you the height of the full fun and a captivating gameplay. Do not forget to recommend your friends and family members if you like this combination of check posts and construction crane. Moreover, you are going to have the experience of handling construction crane. Here you are going to enjoy the army duty games for the country defence and for your home defense. Let us assure you that all the construction vehicles have easy and smooth control. You have to build security wall on border for security. In this airport security wall all process of cutting and simulation are divided into different levels of border crossing wall. This boarder wall is the necessity of the security fences. There was a boundary wall but the enemies have destroyed it with their attacks. So, the mayor of the city has given you an assignment to work on it in palace security wall to save your home from the attacks. The first level of concrete security walls is to break the old wall. You have to take the help from the bulldozer while working on this level of israel west bank wall. The second step of this home security walls is to dig the area with the help of excavator. Now you need to make rod structure using drag and drop in residential security. Then you are supposed to place structure on dig area in high security wall. The gravel is already filled in the truck in chinese security wall. Drive this truck and take it to the construction site in ind border wall construction and park it near the concrete mixer. The concrete mixer is ready now you can fill the dig area with it in defensive wall construction strategy. In this mission of Palestine security wall you have to place structure of walls by using tower crane. Then fill wall with the concrete in school security wall construction. In this mission of airport security wall construction you need to place tower structure by using mobile crane. Fill the tower with concrete in security wall design. Gate is already there take that gate to the site and place it in pak border wall construction and enjoy!Border Security Wall Construction: Wall Building Features:‚òÖ Play our security construction games for FREE on any Android device‚òÖ Buckle up your seat belt and take control of awesome country defense‚òÖ High-quality 3D graphics‚òÖ Many hours of free fun of security wall construction‚òÖ Awesome environments of security games‚òÖ Enjoy super immersive environment and realistic sound effects.‚òÖ Finish all levels, with different objectives and challenges.  Download Border Security Wall Construction: enemy attack sim created bye by  TwoTwenty If you enjoy this FREE game, be sure to rate us 5 stars.

comments: If you are into interactive games, this is a must play. It doesn't have any romance or even a big friendship to speak of, but it is still a game worth playing. The story is interesting and above all, it is fun. The only minor drawback might be its shortness. Despite that, I can only recommend it :).

It was fun the first time. But not a lot changes between playthroughs and despite killing off ylen they appear at the end of the game like nothing happened. Good but perhaps not worth the 3-4 dollar price tag with how short it turned out to be without the replayability.

[Spoilers] Although this game is a bit short, it does deliver on its promise of an interesting storyline. There a few issues, however. As mentioned, the story is short, and because of this, your fellow Gods don't have much development aside from a few possible quests. There are also some oversights. Killing Ylen at the climax of the battle will still result in her appearing later. Things like that. If this game was expanded to a larger experience, I would happily pay more for that. As it is, it's an entertaining short CYOA.

Well i think its a bit short. Tried all possible routes. Being 100% good and 100% bad but all routes have the same ending. Not worth my money,but hey i already bought it since the first 3 chapters are good. But it was a let down

This was the best game I have ever played, no joke! I feel like it was a little too short though, what if you were to add a free mode? A mode where the story wasn't a thing, but you could play the game without it.

While overall the story was alright, it left a lot to be desired. With the game being so short, I assumed that each path had it's own story for you to explore, however the game is very strict about what you can do.  I honestly do regret purchasing the full game, as imo it falls flat fairly quickly after the first three chapters.  Overall, the idea is great, but in execution it is fairly lackluster.
description: Create a mortal race to worship you and grow your strength. Guide them in their daily lives and help them grow. The power you collect will grow your mind and body. Dabble in the affairs of other gods or seek to destroy them and steal their power."The Aether: Life as a God" is a 60,000 word interactive fantasy novel by A. Reddwolf, where your choices control the story. It's entirely text-based‚Äîwithout graphics or sound effects‚Äîand fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.‚Ä¢ Create a custom mortal race.‚Ä¢ Engage in mortal affairs.‚Ä¢ Travel the Aether and steal power from lesser beings.‚Ä¢ Dabble in political affairs at The Court of Gods.‚Ä¢ Battle other gods in epic one one one conflicts.‚Ä¢ Complete unique quests and events with impactful outcomes.
descriptionHTML:
Create a mortal race to worship you and grow your strength. Guide them in their daily lives and help them grow. The power you collect will grow your mind and body. Dabble in the affairs of other gods or seek to destroy them and steal their power.

"The Aether: Life as a God" is a 60,000 word interactive fantasy novel by A. Reddwolf, where your choices control the story. It's entirely text-based—without graphics or sound effects—and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

• Create a custom mortal race.
• Engage in mortal affairs.
• Travel the Aether and steal power from lesser beings.
• Dabble in political affairs at The Court of Gods.
• Battle other gods in epic one one one conflicts.
• Complete unique quests and events with impactful outcomes.
recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ Countless minor bug fixes and changes.
‚Ä¢ Tweaked the rate at which you gain alignment points toward Good/Evil.
‚Ä¢ You should now receive the correct ending to Nothastrus' quest.
‚Ä¢ Ylen should now reward you with the correct amount of power.
‚Ä¢ In one of the later chapters, your race should no longer temporarily go from millions to a few hundred population.
summary: Rule over your mortal race, explore the Aether, and become an omnipotent god.
title: The Aether: Life as a God

comments: Players are bailing from this game like crazy. My clan has lost nearly all the higher level players, most from leaving the game. So the clan is all low level players who can't contribute as much. Arena player's list shows everyone but the top 3 not playing all week. A ton of other issues that you can find in any ABE forum and even in the comments on posts on the ABE Facebook page. I think Rovio's stock trend shows it all.

This use to be my favorite game. Have spent alot of money playing. Due to the "white out" have not been able to play for 3 months. Even after several updates, nothing. Tech support claims to be on the issue... Very frustrating!!!!

I used to love this game, but the changes make me HATE it now. Like it's so hard to get a premium hatch ticket now, yet y'all still throw two star and three star Birds in there. The Halloween event is impossible with the numbers set so high, and the amount of skulls you receive in a battle is 5-10 max. This game has become a money pit, and I think I'm out. Rovio got greedy, and I don't appreciate it. You ruined the game for sure

OK. So, it started off fun. But, now all I get is lost connection, slow connection or some other BS! I'm not going to be able to get any further because I won't pay for stuff. So, it's going to be uninstalled. Of you must, play for a week, then ditch it
The game keeps closing during play causing player's to loose prizes and money. It's having more problems with every update. Support staff are pretty useless when reporting glitches.

More or less meh, can do with or without. Asks frequently if you enjoy the app, if you say "no" then that's it. However, only if you say "yes" will it ask you to rate it. Pathetic that the developers don't actually want feedback. Needs some smoothing out on a few things, but Rovio doesn't care.

descriptionHTML:
Collect, assemble, and evolve your flock.
100+ crazy new Angry Birds?! We’re gonna need a bigger nest. The flock is bigger and badder than ever before. Build your own team, combine super skills and evolve your birds into their ultimate form.

Embark on an epic adventure.
Something sinister is brewing on Bird Island. Why are there so many pigs around? Who is behind the mysterious Bacon Corp? What’s the Eagle Force? Who lost the dungeon keys? Find the answers – only in Angry Birds Evolution.

Crush the pigs in explosive battles.
What’s worse than egg-stealing pigs? Over 90 different varieties of egg-stealing Pigs, that's what. Pirates, ninjas, tourists – someone has to clean this place up. Let the feathers fly in full contact battles and send the pigs packing.

Join weekly events.
Earn awesome rewards, and get a chance to add extra rare birds to your team by taking part in weekly events. Join by yourself or assemble a clan of buddies to compete with other clans. Build the strongest, most awesome clan on Bird Island and rule the roost!

Compete against other players.
The Oinktagon: two teams enter – only one leaves (victorious). Challenge other players in PVP tournaments of the Bird Island pastime, Pigball, and dominate the leagues for even more awesome rewards.


FEATURES:
– Over 100 colorful new characters to hatch and collect.
– Assemble the ultimate flock of birds and take down the pigs with ease.
– 5 Classes of birds with unique abilities.
– Evolve your feathery heroes into unstoppable super birds.
– Explore the island and stop the Bacon Corp.
– Climb up the Eagle Mountain and win ultimate eggs.
– Battle other players in the Oinktagon.
– Join clans to unlock perks, compete with other clans, and chat with clanmates.
– Send out scouts for rewards & challenges.


This game may include:
- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.
- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.
- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.
- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.
- This application may require internet connectivity and subsequent data transfer charges may apply. After the initial download, additional content will be downloaded and this may include data charges.
developerAddress:
Rovio Entertainment Corporation
Keilaranta 7,
FI-02150 ESPOO
FINLAND
recentChanges: Angry Birds Evolution gets faster, better, and angrier with some minor improvements.
summary: Build an unstoppable flock.
title: Angry Birds Evolution

comments: Guys, this is an amazing game! Seriously, only problem the jump button is EXTEMELY unresponsive.. especially on the swimming levels, is this a design choice or a small bug, because on the normal land levels its "ok" still horrible but on the swimming levels its extremely unresponsive and is hard to stay consistant. This is the games biggest flaw. Its EXTREMELY unresponsive

Great game! Quite challenging, and really fun. I have a small bug to report. On level 8 on Classic mode, the air meter is messed up. Multiple times I have spawned and immediately died from drowning. Pretty annoying. Also, when you first enter the spinning spike section (level 8 or 9, I can't remember), the entry field is placed quite high. Sometimes I try to swim under the spikes on lvl 8 and then get warped to the next section and immediately touch the spinning spikes. But other than those two bugs, the game is amazing!

Love this game! I have beaten both new and classic levels and they are awesome. The spinning line of blades that go up and down the screen in Level 8 is especially brutal, and to me several tries to beat. To everyone saying its impossible, its not. Juat keep trying and you will get it. Overall just a fun mobile game.

Great don't know why people are complaining about difficulty, just got to learn the patterns. There is a glitch though that doesn't let you access the third submarine (level 11?) level half the time. Get a game in development screen instead

Is a there a bug when i am trying to go down in submarine spikes that swings level 9 cuz i think i cant go fast enough down wards in the last thing that i needed to dodge where the spikes go up and down then the 3 one is just impossible since i am too slow??  Just me being bad or is it a bug?

Great game i love tge difficulty i alway get out when i die alot but find my self coming back and playing and gettin to new levels. I wish you do more games like it and go to pc and console also with better graphics

descriptionHTML:
Traps, Traps and Traps. One of the best new game of 2018 and one of the most popular adventure mobile game.

Start Playing Trap Dungeons 2 Adventure game today.

Trap Dungeons 2 is a simple 2D action adventure crazy game where you have to go from one point to the other. Just beware of the traps.

WHAT'S YOUR NEXT MOVE?

Features:

* 2D crazy adventure game
* Multiple levels with increasing difficulty
* A wide variety of traps
* Easy to use controls
* Puzzle game with lots of puzzles to solve using your brain
* A bunch of surprises that you may or may not like
* New levels are added every week
* Special hard levels for hardcore gamers
* No Internet Game - one of the best offline games
* 8 Bit Game
* Free to play ,Say NO to Pay to win.
* Adventure game filled with frustrating Traps
* Run like hell. Running is the best step you can go for.

The infamous Trap Dungeons 2 is finally out on android.

Follow the levels of Epic Saga Adventure in Trap Dungeons 2 which is loved by thousands of players around the world. Compete with friends and please don’t rage quit. Be vigilant and aware of your crazy surroundings.

Trap Dungeons 2 is easy to control 2D Adventure Game but hard to master. Trap Dungeons 2 is a symbol of retro platform adventure games

Trap dungeons 2 is an action packed, 2D adventure best offline game.

Caution!! This may be the most hardest, irritating, frustrating game EVER.
As written above, Trap Dungeons 2 is VERY STRESSFUL.
You may get so irritated and frustrated that you throw your phone out the window.

Even after reading this you are still eager to try this hard game - Trap Dungeons 2, then go ahead.

And may be someday you'll get out of Trap Dungeons 2 . Though I doubt it.

Don't you get bored from all these famous games on Android play store like any famous game or any top free games? Well, It's time for some change. Begin the era of hardest games on earth like Trap Dungeons. Throughout Trap Dungeons 2 you will get 2D cubic adventure with extreme hard levels.

comments: I absolutely love this game...And I saw a small easer egg in it as well!!! I am a big Stranger Things fan and when I caught the green frog called HOPPER(sounds familiar?)and I looked at his bio I saw that it said that his fav toy is a FLASHLIGHT, which Hopper uses in the Upside Down, his fav food if coffee, and Hopper is well known for his 'Mornings are for coffee and contemplation' quote and it said that the frog's life is getting STRANGER and STRANGER! Like come on it has to be a Stranger Things easer egg....like if u agree. Other than that i really like the game it is so cute and the bunnies are adorable!üòç

I really like this app and I have fun playing it :D I love the concept of collecting pets while running and it motivates me to collect all the pets I can possibly get! However I have a problem. When I first open the app it's all fine and it loads and I can play. However the moment I close the app then open it again it won't load. It'll just stay on that screen with the tiger and panda. I tried undownloading and downloading again and it worked when I first opened the app but when I close out it won't load the 2nd time  I opened the app.

Hello! Can you please get back to me with my question? I have been playing this game for only two days and already have lots of pets tagged ‚ù§. Let me say, this game is so cute, fun, and addicting! Right now I have been trying to figure out what my friends time zone is so I changed the time and time zone,  and I thought all was well. Unfortunately, when I got back onto Dash Tag I still had my unlocked pet, Smoky, as my character but it gave me the tutorial pop up. When I closed the game's tab and reopened the game, it had Sparky and I had lost all my coins, gems, and pets. Please help, it would be appreciated! Thanks!

The game is nice (for graphics and stuffs) but, it has many lags and bugs when i wanted to move my pet when running... and also.. limited ads (trying to play game for free first) so i couldn't even reach 10000 score :(  yeah this game is actually like subway surfers but its pets... it has rare pets... and idk whats the apple or milk equipment does.... i dont see any effects when i equip 1 tho-  you guys can make this game better tho. i kinda wait till the games better and I'll reinstall again

Hello Wildworks! Please read this! I have recently downloaded the game on my Chromebook, which is the only android I own that has the Play Store on it. It would be easier for me if I could get it on my Kindle Fire. Please make Dash Tap avalible to the amazon app store as soon as possible! I would rate 5 stars on there, otherwise my review is a 4 stars. In otherwords, the game is great! It isn't as challenging for me since I already play many games that are like this. Since it's more challenging on the chromebook, I'm still stuck on the first pet you have at the start.  As I said before, please make the app avalible for the amazon app store soon! Thank you!

Although the game is fun, cute, and addicting, there are some things that don't really function. For instance, I'll watch an ad (particularly an ad for deal dash) and it won't continue my round. It works for all ads except deal dash. It also has some obstacles in the Coral canyons setting that are difficult to pass. Ideally, most people playing the game are young at age and I personally feel like the game is a little bit too hard. Overall, it's a good game, but I think some adjustments are necessary.
description: PETS ON THE LOOSE!Run, dash, slide, and jump your way through forest treetops, redrock canyons, and other challenging terrain! Collect dozens of pets, complete daily missions, and unlock tons of fun goodies. Welcome to Dash Tag, the best endless runner game! Choose your favorite pet and get ready to run with your friends and evade capture by Misha! ‚Ä¢	Collect dozens of rare and unique pets‚Ä¢	Play as every pet you collect‚Ä¢	Unlock power-ups, outfits, and stats‚Ä¢	Speed through levels in pet cars‚Ä¢	Endless runner with new missions every day‚Ä¢	Free to play‚Ä¢	Easy to learnUse the coins and emeralds you collect to purchase loads of upgrades like costumes, power-ups, and even pet cars! The farther you run, the more you collect. And the more you collect, the more fun you'll have!So whether you prefer to scamper, scurry, or scuttle, join the fun of this amazing pet adventure today!
descriptionHTML:
PETS ON THE LOOSE!

Run, dash, slide, and jump your way through forest treetops, redrock canyons, and other challenging terrain! Collect dozens of pets, complete daily missions, and unlock tons of fun goodies. Welcome to Dash Tag, the best endless runner game! Choose your favorite pet and get ready to run with your friends and evade capture by Misha!

• Collect dozens of rare and unique pets
• Play as every pet you collect
• Unlock power-ups, outfits, and stats
• Speed through levels in pet cars
• Endless runner with new missions every day
• Free to play
• Easy to learn

Use the coins and emeralds you collect to purchase loads of upgrades like costumes, power-ups, and even pet cars! The farther you run, the more you collect. And the more you collect, the more fun you'll have!

So whether you prefer to scamper, scurry, or scuttle, join the fun of this amazing pet adventure today!
recentChanges: Fixed a bug preventing some devices and emulators from launching the game.
summary: Become your favorite pet and see how far you can go in this adventurous runner.
title: Dash Tag - Fun Endless Runner!

descriptionHTML:
Become a horse owner in our new animal simulator! Raise and groom an entire horse herd on your farm and see if it fits for survival in the wild. Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator if full of animals adventures and funny stuff to do with your horse herd!

Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator features:

>YOUR OWN HORSE HERD - create a unique horse, make a family and raise foals

>REALISTIC ANIMAL CARE - wash and feed your horse and foal, to keep them happy

>OPEN WORLD ADVENURES - explore big world, meet humans, wild animals and other horses

>LOTS OF ACTIVITES - complete quests, take part in horse racing and do other stuff

Customize a horse!
You can choose breed, color, gender and name for your horse, and try to take care of a horse you create! And after that complete quests and fight enemies to make your horse and herd stronger in the animal simulator. A horse herd life is fascinating, experience it in our animal simulator!

Take care of a herd!
Once your horse strong enough, you can star a herd and explore the world together - horse is a herding animal! Groom your foals, level up your horse herd to make a bigger herd in the animal simulator. And don’t forget to wash, feed and play with your horse!

Explore open world!
There’s a lot to do in the animals life simulator, so explore the world with your herd! Interesting quests, wild animals and picturesque locations are waiting - explore the world of the simulator with your horse herd and find them all!

Try living with a horse herd in Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator - a captivating animals life simulator!
summary: Welcome to a farm where you can play with your own herd in a Horse Stable!
title: Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator

descriptionHTML:
Tankr.io is an all new tank shooting and surviving game. The goal of this game is to defeat all of your competitors on the map and fight to the last one. Then you’ll survive and win! Battle against the cunning enemies now!

If you are a tank lover and looking for the stress reliever, tankr.io is waiting for you! Try and enjoy the unique tank battle game!

How to play?
- Control your tank to move around by virtual control lever when your finger touches the screen.
- Fire and shoot your opponents when they show up and come close. Your tank will aim at your competitors automatically.
- Skillfully make the best use of the terrain and grass to attack
- Survive longer with many props and supplies appeared on the ground
- The more opponents you kill, the higher your ranking!
- Remember to upgrade your tank and make it more powerful.

Game Features:
- Real-time tank battle gameplay with simple & easy control
- Auto-targeting with just one click
- Variety of props assist you to fight!
- Highly optimized graphics and sounds
- 3D role and scene, gorgeous combat visual effects
- Cool skins and tanks for your choice. Make your own one!

Download Tankr.io and enjoy the battle now! Have fun!

comments: Just constant ads. Every time you go into a menu you haved to watch an ad. After awhile you need gems for every upgrade. P2P gameplay and ads filled. Gameplay is good, but this game seem to only be maded as a cash grab.
They begged me to rate. But i like it, Stop asking me to rate. I Only like GAMES with painting abilities. Okay?
Cute and delightful, the game is well worth some time. It's addictive gameplay is marred by the tap mechanics in so many other games.

The game is alright. What attracted me to this evolution game in particular was how the phoenixes looked. I killed a few hours on this game, and I decided it's not for me. The ads are also way too frequent. I get that you guys have bills to pay, but I literally get an ad each time I go to Mars. There are also a few grammatical errors here and there, as well as an audio error I noticed. When I go to change the colors of my phoenixes and get interrupted by an ad (everytime I might add), the menu music and the main page music overlap each other. This wouldn't be that big of a deal if it didn't happen every single time I opened up that menu. The game itself can get boring after a while as well, so I'd only recommend this game if you have absolutely nothing better to do. Overall, it's an okay game, but it's absolutely swamped with ads and that really kills it for me.
After 2 min in the game my first thought was: wow so nice and simple. No stress.

Compared to other versions of these games i've played, thus one is one of the best. I like the designs better than other versions. Gameplay is the same but that's fine, I don't mind it. Overall good game.
description: How do phoenixes always manage to rise from their own ashes? We don‚Äôt really know, but now YOU can play a role in their immortal legend!Combine different mutant phoenix species and create endless new mythical firebirds to promptly replace the ones that perish!No one will ever notice this smart trick, and the legend of the phoenix will live on forever!(...or at least as long as you keep playing).LEGENDARY FEATURESüî•Pantheon: a new place for supreme beings to look down on us mortals and laugh at our miseryüî•Impostors: watch out for impostors trying to steal the spotlight from the phoenixes.HOW TO PLAYüî•Drag and drop similar phoenixes to create and merge new mysterious creatures to get to the final and powerful god Phoenixüî•Use phoenix eggs to earn coins, buy new creatures and make even more moneyüî•Alternatively, fiercely tap a phoenix to make coins pop from their eggsHIGHLIGHTSüî•Different stages and many phoenix species to discover and mergeüî•A mind-blowing story with mythical twists in a fantasy world!üî•The unexpected mix of alpaca-like evolution and incremental clicker gamesüî•Doodle-like illustrationsüî•Open-ended gameplay: enjoy the freedom!üî•No phoenixes were harmed in the making of this game, only developers (but they rose from the ashes, too)What is it called when a new phoenix is born? descriptionHTML:
How do phoenixes always manage to rise from their own ashes? We don’t really know, but now YOU can play a role in their immortal legend!

Combine different mutant phoenix species and create endless new mythical firebirds to promptly replace the ones that perish!

No one will ever notice this smart trick, and the legend of the phoenix will live on forever!

(...or at least as long as you keep playing).

LEGENDARY FEATURES

🔥Pantheon: a new place for supreme beings to look down on us mortals and laugh at our misery
🔥Impostors: watch out for impostors trying to steal the spotlight from the phoenixes.

HOW TO PLAY

🔥Drag and drop similar phoenixes to create and merge new mysterious creatures to get to the final and powerful god Phoenix
🔥Use phoenix eggs to earn coins, buy new creatures and make even more money
🔥Alternatively, fiercely tap a phoenix to make coins pop from their eggs

HIGHLIGHTS

🔥Different stages and many phoenix species to discover and merge
🔥A mind-blowing story with mythical twists in a fantasy world!
🔥The unexpected mix of alpaca-like evolution and incremental clicker games
🔥Doodle-like illustrations
🔥Open-ended gameplay: enjoy the freedom!
🔥No phoenixes were harmed in the making of this game, only developers (but they rose from the ashes, too)

What is it called when a new phoenix is born? A phoenix dawn.

If you like Phoenix Evolution, check our other evolution games. We have Dragon, Cow and even Unicorn Evolution.

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

description: A stunning action RPG filled with heroics, adventure, and a diverse assortment of creatures and fiends.Dive into the world of Heroes Infinity and begin your epic journey through many lands and cities. Collect & build your epic team of heroes to achieve victory.[ Features ]EPIC GODS WAR- A real-time strategy battle filled with dynamic effects and varied skill animations.- Many heroes are waiting for you to Unlock & Combine them into a powerful team.STRATEGIC GAMEPLAY- Power Up, Tier Up, Rank Up, and Gear Up to prepare your heroes in their War for Justice.- Summon your heroes wisely to gain Victory in the coming battles.NUMEROUS GAME MODES- Adventure Mode: Gain Experience & Level Up your heroes by defeating your enemies.- Skyscraper: Challenge your epic team by conquering many Levels of increasing difficulty.- Star Gates: Collect pieces of all the heroes‚Äô shards to Summon the mystery heroes.- Training Field: Develop your own skill with heroes in battle to gain victory.- Boss Party: Battle with legendary bosses and gain unique rewards.- Super Boss: Stay focused when the boss is near. Your epic team have to fight hard.DRAMATIC PvP Battles!- Prove your team‚Äôs Strength & Strategy in the 5 vs 5 battle!- Compete with other players in the leaderboard and make your way to the top of the PvP.GUILDS & COMMUNICATION!- Form a Guild with other players- Fight together and earn legendary rewards- Make your Guild the most powerful in the worldOfficial Page: http://heroesinfinity.com/
descriptionHTML:
A stunning action RPG filled with heroics, adventure, and a diverse assortment of creatures and fiends.
Dive into the world of Heroes Infinity and begin your epic journey through many lands and cities. Collect & build your epic team of heroes to achieve victory.

[ Features ]

EPIC GODS WAR
- A real-time strategy battle filled with dynamic effects and varied skill animations.
- Many heroes are waiting for you to Unlock & Combine them into a powerful team.

STRATEGIC GAMEPLAY
- Power Up, Tier Up, Rank Up, and Gear Up to prepare your heroes in their War for Justice.
- Summon your heroes wisely to gain Victory in the coming battles.

NUMEROUS GAME MODES
- Adventure Mode: Gain Experience & Level Up your heroes by defeating your enemies.
- Skyscraper: Challenge your epic team by conquering many Levels of increasing difficulty.
- Star Gates: Collect pieces of all the heroes’ shards to Summon the mystery heroes.
- Training Field: Develop your own skill with heroes in battle to gain victory.
- Boss Party: Battle with legendary bosses and gain unique rewards.
- Super Boss: Stay focused when the boss is near. Your epic team have to fight hard.

DRAMATIC PvP Battles!
- Prove your team’s Strength & Strategy in the 5 vs 5 battle!
- Compete with other players in the leaderboard and make your way to the top of the PvP.

GUILDS & COMMUNICATION!
- Form a Guild with other players
- Fight together and earn legendary rewards
- Make your Guild the most powerful in the world

Official Page: http://heroesinfinity.com/

summary: A hard-core strategy action RPG packed 1v1 duel.
title: Heroes Infinity: Gods Future Fight

comments: This used to be my favorite match 3 game of all, but lately every level is impossible unless you get JUST the right amount of luck in the gems that fall. I'll give it a few more tried and then I'm uninstalling it.
After 4hrs got to level 6 & couldn't even get close to progressing further. Seemed no point in playing the same level over & over & over again so I quit, you win (but you lost me)

I had rated it 5 stars even though it's tough to pass some levels. It took me more than a year to get to the 18-20th house & then an update sent me back to the beginning. :-( I don't play much anymore.

Relaxing - challenging, love the graphics Update: I was recently out of town and happened to check my bank account thoroughly for something else - I found all kinds of charges I didn't make but came from this game. It came to my attention because I didn't have time to play, not to mention I don't care how long it takes to pass a level so rarely pay for anything to pass a level. LOTS of unauthorized charges - I'm speechless and just sick. Had to cancel my card. I'll NEVER submit a card number for a game again - unless it's a throwaway visa - it would be the only way I would purchase in the future. Its a fun game -  DONT  let them into your account. Just...dont.

... UPDATE ON 3-1-2018 ... Was 5 star now 1. In my best Dalek voice UN--IN--STALL!!! Not sure which update did it, but this game that was one incredible is now slow as molasses! Each move painstakingly takes about 5 seconds for the gems to fall. I'm completely bummed. üòï

Slow and impossible. Yon need to collect items to move forward.  To collect items you need to beat the same previous level over and over. Just completing a level once is a major achievement. Got bored uninstalled

comments: This  was really  fun! Starts off easy but gets harder, not near the ads of the  other games I have played. Takes extra words, hints are reasonable,  earning money is reasonable.  So far the best of the word connects !! Really happy with this game, will add to my phone  and get rid of the other word connect games that seem to have ad, after ad not to mention the high amount for hints! There is one reason I didn't  give it a 5, because some of the ads get stuck and you can't  exit,  overall  4.8!

I love this game! As others have stated it's very addictive! It's also challenging when you get up in the amount of games you played. My only problem is that when you're asked to watch a video to collect points, the video stops playing and and you don't collect the points. This has happened to me 5 times in a row. Other than that, I do not know what people are talking about as far as a lot of ads. I don't find that at all.

Not a bad time killer - quick paced and not too taxing on the brain. I wish it had a more comprehensive dictionary so you would still get bonus points for valid words like 'cad.' No matter - still basically a four star, though almost three for the number of ads.

The game isn't bad if you like word puzzles. My dislike comes from the fact that I have push notifications for this app turned off, but it somehow continues to manage to send them. It also keeps poor track of your coins. Good time killer.

Child-friendly! And, as an adult? I love how am yet to see an advertisement. üòä  Unlike other word games like Word Connect, it also lets you find and play words that are not necessarily those found on the board, storing it in an "Extra" slot, which generates added points to your score, rather than telling you to choose the word that's only on the board.  ADDENDUM: After reading the comments, it appears there may be ads after all. Am yet to see any though. Perhaps because am still in a lower level.

Game is fun. But giving me pop ups to bring me back to the game while it's not open is a nono. Especially when it takes up half the screen. I'd give 5 stars cause i had fun playong this, but this one thing is annoying. Especially with the amount of ads, it shows you just wanna push people to keep playing for that ad revenue. Won't be downloading any of your games after i delete this now.

comments: Very good! The graphics are reminiscent of scribblenauts, which is a great look, controls are simple yet very good. But, I do have two problems: One, the pricing of the sets are too much for what they are. 6.99? More like 4.99. The currency i can understand, maybe bump up the quantity of the 50.00 dollar currency pack, otherwise, the currency pricing is fair. The other one is that there are many framerate bugs! Please attempt to fix them! Besides my problems, the game gets a score, in my book, of a 4.0, great game!

It was a fantastic time eating, addictive, fun game;  The developer became greedy with too many ads.  Also, at the same time, it started using too many resources, frequently pausing for up to two seconds during gameplay, rendering it unplayable.  I really enjoyed this game. Nice, challenging physics and strategy through design and problem solving.

Only reason I've won't give 5 stars is that they use to give holidays special mission this year they've skipped it. Seen a few improvements other last year an half but nothing major. But all in all fun game build crafts and hope u make it.

Recent update filled the game with adds. Used to play and only see adds when finishing a mission and selecting the option for extra coins or gems. Now they auto play adds between runs forcing you to have to watch two for the benefit. Good game but they got greedy.

I really like the game however when i was playing i finally got the bigfoot and played for awhile. Then i left the game to play my Xbox but when i got back on i didnt have the bigfoot anymore which really got me mad. So please fix that bug

Game used to be good. Started playing again recently and the amount of ads is just abysmal. They also seriously lowered gold rewards for completing levels. The game play is fun, but if I were starting now and didn't have decent parts and upgrades from before, I would have dropped it immediately. Shame it ended up like it's current state. No longer recommend.

description: Your name is Bobby and you're stuck in your dreams. Dreams about beast fights with gangs. Although the fights is beast, but it involve flat humans.You have strange dreams about how human from gangs fall from a great height to a flat floor.To get rid of these dreams you have to take part in beast fighting without rules with other gangs and flat human. Be smart and use the environment in your favor.Drop plasticine human from a great height onto a flat floor. But do not be afraid, you will not harm them. After all, these thick funny and clumsy little humans are made of clay. They do not hurt at all.Therefore, use the boldest decisions to win in these beast battles without rules. Remember that physics is your assistant. Win in battles without rules wrestling, to get rid of these ridiculous dreams about the fall of human on a flat floor.

descriptionHTML:
Start your construction today! Create your infinite fictional world!

Enjoy this endless paradise.

Build, destroy, move, fly, jump and craft. And all this for free !!!

There are over 100 different items in your inventory to build separate rooms including a living room, bedroom, toilet, bathroom, a private garden, a house for animals.

Easily place the standard blocks that you want to install and use them to build something, you can build everything you can imagine.

Choose creativity or survival mode, move through your world and make it more remarkable.

Move through this endless world in flight, save your work, and play again later.

Everyone loves Kraft games, they have become popular all over the world; You can start with a few blocks and gradually build an empire.

Explore and start developing your dream. You can use many different items, so you can create your ideal Kingdom. The game is infinite, which makes it so intriguing.

★★★★★ PLEASE RATE THIS GAME WITH 5 STARS★★★★★

For those who still see the error at the beginning. Go into the settings of your phone. Selects programs and games. Look for our game: Exploration Prime. Choose this. Then you can grant permissions to the game. Then you need to give the game permission to write to your storage. After that, the game will work.

Enjoy!

The game Exploration Prime is an open source project which is subject to the LGPLv3 license. Before using the code, you must read the entire license and agree to it.

comments: The game is so easy, yet the challenge comes from the setup. Make money, level up heroes, gain more warriors, and upgrade skills. Simple concept right? You can also send your heroes to dungeons to make money in the background in and out of the game. In VIP, the only ads are at the times you choose to watch, and you will watch them until you get permanent unlock of that ability. Expect lots of ads in the beginning and much fewer late in the game once everything is unlocked. More importantly, enjoy slaying the Devil's Army.

Awesome addictive game not like the other idle game much more fun you can choose to play interactive or sit back and just watch it's all up to you. Not only is the game great but the devs are just as great, I had a question sent an email and in "5 MINUTES" I already had an email back with the answer I wanted. Best part was it was a small silly question and they took the time to answer it! Great job keep it up!

An interesting twist on standard clicker/tap games. Sadly the prices are nuts. Ascension costs you gems instead of rewarding you with them. Only so you can battle it out with bosses to get gems again. This means everything takes forever after a while. And there are very heavy grind walls where the cost to value rate really drops. This goes double for the dungeon.  Almost beat it in two days but started getting bored of just watching and waiting.
Terrible IAP. It's worse than most free to play games yet they're charging for this app. Avoid at all costs, plenty of better options out there.

For those saying you hit a paywall there's an option to go back to the first areas and do them again to gain gems again. If youre like me games like this are easily exploited. Ive bought all gem items already

Definitely the worst idle game I've found. Feels like something thrown together by one person in a day. Gameplay is boring and poorly thought out. The store prices are so out of touch with reality. 70$ to buy an auto tap.

description: Yoga Challenge is a new app that can be really funny. Complete as many solo or team poses as you can before the time runs out. You can see the photos or videos it takes afterwards.This app is full featured and contains many features which increase the fun. You can view side by side comparison of the yoga challenge poses you made using your camera. There are multiple difficulties, the yoga challenge for two can be completed solo or with a friend co-op. Save photos/video to view afterwards or share. You can unlock great prizes like avatars and backgrounds.There are many different styles of poses and disciplines. Yoga asanas, Yoga Nidra,  Bikram Yoga, Kundalini Yoga, Acro Yoga, Vinyasa Yoga and more.Team Mode(2 Player): Master yoga poses with a friend in a yoga challenge for two. Solo Mode(1 Player): Practice your yoga in various different disciplines.Special Features:-Take pictures and video of your poses.-Yoga Challenge GO, has Yoga for beginners, Yoga for kids, yoga for dummies and Yoggies.-Difficulty Modes: Beginner Yoga, Easy Yoga, Medium Yoga. Hard Yoga poses.-Weight Loss Goals: Encourages a healthy lifestyle, physical exercise and breathing techniques.-Yoga Friend/Family Party: You can play this with one and two player modes.-60+ Yoga physical exercise poses.-Can share your yoga challenge videos and photos.-Artistic hand drawn poses.-Unlock avatars and backgrounds.Please ,leave a review and feedback on what you love about that app and what we can improve :)
descriptionHTML:
Yoga Challenge is a new app that can be really funny. Complete as many solo or team poses as you can before the time runs out. You can see the photos or videos it takes afterwards.

This app is full featured and contains many features which increase the fun. You can view side by side comparison of the yoga challenge poses you made using your camera. There are multiple difficulties, the yoga challenge for two can be completed solo or with a friend co-op. Save photos/video to view afterwards or share. You can unlock great prizes like avatars and backgrounds.

There are many different styles of poses and disciplines. Yoga asanas, Yoga Nidra, Bikram Yoga, Kundalini Yoga, Acro Yoga, Vinyasa Yoga and more.

Team Mode(2 Player): Master yoga poses with a friend in a yoga challenge for two.
Solo Mode(1 Player): Practice your yoga in various different disciplines.

Special Features:
-Take pictures and video of your poses.
-Yoga Challenge GO, has Yoga for beginners, Yoga for kids, yoga for dummies and Yoggies.
-Difficulty Modes: Beginner Yoga, Easy Yoga, Medium Yoga. Hard Yoga poses.

-Yoga Friend/Family Party: You can play this with one and two player modes.
-60+ Yoga physical exercise poses.
-Can share your yoga challenge videos and photos.

-Unlock avatars and backgrounds.

Please ,leave a review and feedback on what you love about that app and what we can improve :)

description: The Amazing Spider-Hero was a regular teenage boy before an alien arachnobeast fused with him and gave him amazing special powers! He became stronger, faster, more agile and has animal-like instincts that can help him detect and avoid dangers. Instructed by his father who is an expert in 42 forms of martial arts, including taekwondo, kickboxing, kung fu, boxing, wresting, muay thai, jiu jitsu, and many more, he made full use of his new-found powers to become a hero of justice and righteousness, donning the mantle of Spider-Hero. But that's not all, the strange Spider-Hero's great intellect also allowed him to develop many useful equipment to combat crime and battle villains. Aided by his mother, the head of a highly advanced research center, the Avenger Institute, he created various versions of his Spider-Suit each more powerful than the last and further enhances his strength, power, spider-sense, and agility. The Spider-Suits also come equipped with highly advanced Web-Spinners which allow the Amazing Spider-Hero to capture or immobilize foes with ease and play with them like a fidget spinner.Even with all that, the Amazing Spider-Hero is still just a teenage boy, he can't be out all the time. So, he must go through a long journey home while defending justice and beating up whatever thugs and monsters that may be in his way before going back to the Avenger Institute.The Amazing Spider-Hero is heading home, but many strange thugs, mutant brutes and strange mutant bulk monsters will try to stop him on the way home. Play as the Amazing Spider-Hero in multi heroic action as he jumps across rooftops, enemies, and helicopters get as far and defeat as many criminals as he can before getting home. Use marvellous spider powers like double-jumps, web-shots, and hyper-dives to fight thugs and jump across buildings! Leap across buildings, jump above enemies and become the best Spider-Hero of 2018 and beyond! Will you be the truly marvellous Amazing Spider-Hero Homecoming?Features:- Amazing 2D Graphics & Animation- Amazing Running Gameplay- Amazing Spider-Suits- Amazing Spider-Powers- Amazing Spider-Hero- Amazing FREE Game of 2018Become the most amazing superhero, defender of justice, warrior of good, and guardian of humanity in 2018 and beyond as Spider-Hero, in Spider-Hero: Homecoming. Play now and prove your heroic worth!As always, check out our other AMAZING games at Gunaga! Thank you for playing.

description: Scooter Freestyle Extreme 3D 2, is the sequal to the first Scooter FE3D game.The sequal has a massive upgrade to graphics, physics, animations, and pretty much everything else.Awesome freestyle scooter game in 3D. Go blast the skatepark to earn points to upgrade and customize your character, your scooter and your skills.Whether you like skating street, or big ramps, half pipes and bowls, Scooter FE3D 2 has it all!Ride fast, do manuals, slides, flip tricks, grabs, wall rides and all the other tricks you can imagine, and line them together for insane combos like the pros!Customize your characters clothes and scooter!Earn skill points to level up your characters skills, like jump height, spin speed and more!Play 3 different game modes: Arcade Mode, S-C-O-O-T Mode and Free Run!The game is developed by independent developer EnJen Games. Follow EnJen Games on www.facebook.com/EnJenGames, to request new features, report bugs, or get the latest news about new EnJen Games or updates!
descriptionHTML:
Scooter Freestyle Extreme 3D 2, is the sequal to the first Scooter FE3D game.

The sequal has a massive upgrade to graphics, physics, animations, and pretty much everything else.

Awesome freestyle scooter game in 3D.
Go blast the skatepark to earn points to upgrade and customize your character, your scooter and your skills.

Whether you like skating street, or big ramps, half pipes and bowls, Scooter FE3D 2 has it all!

Ride fast, do manuals, slides, flip tricks, grabs, wall rides and all the other tricks you can imagine, and line them together for insane combos like the pros!

Customize your characters clothes and scooter!

Earn skill points to level up your characters skills, like jump height, spin speed and more!

Play 3 different game modes: Arcade Mode, S-C-O-O-T Mode and Free Run!

The game is developed by independent developer EnJen Games. Follow EnJen Games on www.facebook.com/EnJenGames, to request new features, report bugs, or get the latest news about new EnJen Games or updates!
summary: Scooter Freestyle Extreme 3D 2!Skate parks, earn skills and upgrade characters.
title: Scooter FE3D 2

comments: Such a shame. The game is great, really enjoyed the concept however it is a prime example of how monetisation strategy can ruin a game. Gems too difficult to earn without buying them, and purposely easy to accidentally spend them. Too many ads too. I'd rather have paid for the game. Deleted it after a  day or so.

Not What It Used To Be  The second to last update I did for this app switched the aim of the ball to slightly off from where you point it. So now have to compensate (guess a bit) when you're aiming which makes play more challenging.  Likewise, levels beyond about 440 are becoming impossible to beat w/o saving like a weeks with of bonuses to use on each level. Beating one level a week is hardly fun anymore! I may be uninstalling this app soon.
Everything has been great till about 1 month ago when the graph is slowed downed. After you start off there's delays in the line of balls and very unsettling it's not continuous anymore.

Game has so much potential and is a blast. I'm giving it a bad rating because gems are insanely expensive and they have so many buttons to hit to "use 200 gems to remove 3 lines" as one example or another to lose 200 by placing the button right above the back button on a phone. Super lame move on devs to intentionally take insanely expensive gems from us by mistake. No confirmation or anything, just boom, gone. Lacks ethics to say the least rinow
Games fine. I refuse to rate a game well when it's annoying ads start pushing political agenda against gun owners. Will go elsewhere
Great game.   But one of the adverts is a virus.   The IG Academy advert wrecked my game and now my phone's being a pain in the ass

comments: Very good app that trains logical thinking. If you want to be a computer scientist, math isnt everything since math and logic are different areas. This game gives a pretty good idea of whats behind coding, and its a good supplement to play when you are bored while improving some skills at the same time. The controls could improve, such as being able to reset the bots position, or cancel a loop run without having to reset all the code. Im looking forward for more planets :D

One of the best applications I have encountered till date. Am not into programming, but still had to learn it as a necessary course for a semester. There was no need of it afterwards, so the teachers were simply skimming everything. We were taught from basics to looping in two classes with zero previous knowledge about programming. But still this thing caught my attention. Only if they would have recommended this game to one and all, we would have spent a nice semester. This game pretty much explains the basics, but with better understanding. Great job.

Love this game/app. I mean the only thing I wish it had a little more instruction to learn from (I got function-2 but not the way it should have been done.)  Just as I am "self teaching" with only books and apps. But anyway this app still gets 5 stars.

For User: If u intrested about programing language.Play this helpful game to learn basic , function and loop methods of programing.  For Developer: This is helpful fun game for learning programing game.Keep try. I want to advise you.  First: When U go your Profile,use Intent To Direct Facebook App when Facebook App is Installed. Second: Use Rate This App Function to get more Point on Your App. Third. When I tap RUN button,it cannot stop if loop was entered.So use pause and stop buttons for 2 functions because if i can't stop i tap Retry button and all of code are gone away and stard think again.it's the bad moment for me.  More Easy More Powerful.Thaks.

Difficulty level is all over the place. Doesn't really do well to teach programing concepts and more of just puzzles.   Coding is about finding the most efficient way to do something.   The game actually encourages you to do an infinite loop and run redundant steps to complete a puzzle.   Crashes almost all the time

It's interesting, but my main gripe is that it really doesn't feel like you're learning how to code. There's also a bug where if you press the restart button it erases all your work. So, if your robot is stuck in an endless loop, you can't save your work at all. It's also a bit short at the moment, finished all the levels in under an hour.
